name: Courtyard by Marriott Philadelphia Devon

reviews.title: Very Adequate Hotel
reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, this hotel can be a bit tricky to find, but if you follow the advice offered here (look for the Big K -- it's behnd that and to the right), you'll have little trouble. It's a perfectly adequate hotel -- excactly what you would expect of a Courtyard -- no more and no less. Staff were friendly and helpful. The room was clean. Everything worked. The breakfast was good, if not great. I did wish there was wireless Internet in the rooms -- it was only in the lobby -- but wire access was available in the room.

reviews.title: very pleased
reviews.text: stayed three nights as doing a show at valley forge convention center. Had breakfast one day, it was fine. The room was an excellent location for us. Housekeeping was very good. Check in with Gary was a breeze. Close to Whole Foods supermarket, Bertuccis, etc. Will stay again.

reviews.title: Its well hidden but otherwise a standard Courtyart
reviews.text: The 1st thing is to note that this Courtyard is well hidden off to the side and towards the back of a shopping area. If you are driving along looking for a large 'Courtyard' sign which is in front of most Marriott properties, you search will be in vain. Do not ask at the gas station 1/2 mile down the road - the guy was clueless and sent reckoned it was two miles away in the wrong direction!

reviews.title: Standard Courtyard
reviews.text: Just look out for the Big K and its in that shopping precinct behind a bank/cash outlet which actually fronts the road.

reviews.title: I recommend this place!
reviews.text: So its a convenient location with shops and other stuff nearby.

reviews.title: Great experience!
reviews.text: I stayed at the Courtyard Philadelphia Devon in Wayne, PA for a wedding in the area from June 16-June 18. I had a great experience at this hotel.

reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
reviews.text: I checked in late but the person at the desk was very friendly and helpful. The room was very, very clean and had been recently remodeled. The beds were very comfortable with lots of pillows and my room had a view of a lovely courtyard. The bathroom was quite large and had good water pressure.

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Philadelphia Devon Hotel
